title: Simplify Development Task interface
description: As a developer, I want to remove unnecessary UI elements from the Development Task interface so that the workflow is streamlined and focused.
iWant: to remove unnecessary UI elements from the Development Task interface
soThat: the workflow is streamlined and focused
acceptanceCriteria: Branch link is removed from Development Task UI
PR created and ready for development text is hidden
Rebase link is removed from the interface
Development Task interface displays only essential elements
UI remains functional after element removal
